items.title: Fix missing artist_clip_id in Platform Service ðŸŽ¶
items.summary: This update adds the missing artist_clip_id field to the ttapi worker's artist_consistency request, which was causing upstream 400 errors. Other providers were correctly sending this field, and now ttapi aligns with them to ensure proper functionality.

items.title: Fix Veo API Cost Conditions in Backend ðŸš€
items.summary: This update corrects the action condition for the Veo API cost rules, changing it from 'generate' to include 'text2video' and 'image2video'. The cost file has been modified accordingly, and tests have been updated to reflect these changes, ensuring accurate credit deductions for video generation requests. Overall, this enhances the functionality and reliability of the API.
